入门前，阿这。入门后，阿这。

Что я могу сказать? Классика есть классика и от нее никуда не деться. Пока мой скептический взгляд на GO не смягчился, я отдавала предпочтение этой прекрасной части более десяти лет - и ни капли не жалею. Часы проведенные здесь, по совместительству и в Скайпе со школьными товарищами - незабываемые. Но какими бы новыми играми нас не заманивали, какой бы графикой не радовали, Source остаётся неизменным фаворитом, заходя в который можно немного поностальгировать. Рекомендовать не буду, потому что в это обязан играть каждый уважающий себя геймер.

the only reason i ever played cs source was not for the comp, but for dogz gungame, but even that server is shit now. the community thus far from what ive seen is a toxic ass piece of radiated shit. all i get is "be faster bro, oh, u need aiming clases bro!" DO YOU FUCKING THINK BEING MLG PRO OR IN COMP TOURNAMENT IS ON MY FUCKING MIND YOU IDIOT? DO YOU? CAUSE ITS NOT. ALL I WANT IS TO HAVE FUN, BUT ALL I GET IN GUN GAME IS  u need 5 kills to level up! dogz is the only gungame server without that restriction but has a new type of poison tthat is worse. any kill you shot after doesint count because assists are removed. 2nd, i cant bunny hop, and i dont bother trying, so shut the hell up with this "git gud" bullshit, cause thats the crap ive heard from call of duty players. cs source is nothing but a toxic game with a community that mocks you for "not being mlg pro enough" and will ridicule you over and over and over again until you leave the game and never return. if you buy cs source, buy garrys mod with it, as that community is not a toxic cesspool of radioactive shit.

Doğrusunu söylemek gerekirse bu oyun cs:go ya göre daha eğlenceli ama cs:go nun daha adaletli ve mantıklı bir oyun olduğunu söyleyebilirim. Düşmanlarınız sizi saçma sapan şekillerde koşarak vurabiliyorlar. Aynı şekilde cs:go da olduğu gibi oyunda baya hile var (hiç şaşmaz). Bana karakter hızları bir tık daha fazla silah sekmeleri bir tık daha az gibi geldi ve bu da siz efendi efendi spray atacakken bi anda p90 lı bir yavşağın gelip siz ne olduğunu anlamadan  en fazla 1-2 mermi isabet ettirerek ölmenize sebep oluyor :d arada böyle yarım saat veya 1 saat oynayıp eğlenmek maksadıyla indirimde (benim yaptığım gibi) 1-2 liraya alınabilir. Tavsiye ediyorum

CS:S - a Good, atmospheric game, in fact, all the same CS 1.6, only on the Sourse engine. I like it, like all parts of CS. There is good and bad in it, as in all games. 

The picture is nice, it does not hurt the eye, it will go on the most antediluvian PCs, unlike CS:GO, the community mainly consists of men of 20-30 years, sometimes there are children, most of them adequate (at least on the servers on which I played). Weapons are not radically different from CS 1.6, but the physics of shooting and throwing grenades, I think, is better. There are almost no cheaters (I did not come across them). Of the disadvantages, it is worth noting that the servers have additional content that slightly spoils the entourage of the original CS, but this is more about the creators of the servers, not the game.

Bottom line: CS:S is a great game to play, it is clearly worth it, something even better than CS:GO and CS 1.6.

Thank you for your attention!
